channel.title: ZC's Hugo Exercise Site
channel.description: Recent content on ZC's Hugo Exercise Site

item.title: This is a first test page
item.description: I’m wondering what is this character used for “#” And frankly speaking, it looks hugo is able to detect the correct marker for certain contents. Like if I tried to use Book Name. will it do what I suppose it will do? But what about underline, or bold characters, or video and images? This is kind of cool I can just type whatever I want, but I feel it is way more than this.
